description: This Java source file defines the class EventWrapper, which extends the Wrapper class and implements the TemplateMappings interface. The class encapsulates event-related data such as event variable, event codes, and dependencies, and provides methods for managing and building dependencies among event wrappers in a code generation context.

classes.name: EventWrapper
classes.description: A class representing an event that can have dependencies on enums, other events, or custom objects. It manages event codes, dependencies, and language masking for code generation.

methods.name: EventWrapper
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the EventWrapper with a given EventVariable and sets up the section mask.

methods.name: getVariable
methods.description: Returns the base variable associated with this event, which is an EventVariable.

methods.name: getDependencies
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the dependencies of this event wrapper.

methods.name: getEventCodes
methods.description: Returns the list of event codes (names) associated with this event.

methods.name: setEventCodes
methods.description: Sets the list of event codes for this event.

methods.name: getEventCodesString
methods.description: Returns a comma-separated string of the event codes.

methods.name: buildDependencies
methods.description: Analyzes the variables within the event and adds dependencies on enums, other events, or custom objects as needed.

methods.name: addDependency
methods.description: Adds a dependency wrapper to this event's dependencies list and updates its language mask accordingly.
